name: Thai Tenses: Shower Activities
description: Learn Thai tenses through questions and answers about showering

frontContent.text: คุณอาบน้ำหรือยัง

backContent.text: Have you taken a shower yet?

cards.phonetic: khun aap nam rue yang
cards.context: Asking if someone has completed their shower (present perfect tense)

examples.original: คุณอาบน้ำหรือยังครับ
examples.translation: Have you taken a shower yet? (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: khun aap nam rue yang krap

examples.original: น้องอาบน้ำหรือยังคะ
examples.translation: Has the child taken a shower yet? (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: nong aap nam rue yang ka

frontContent.text: ฉันอาบน้ำแล้ว

backContent.text: I have already taken a shower

cards.phonetic: chan aap nam laew
cards.context: Responding that you have completed your shower (present perfect tense)

examples.original: ผมอาบน้ำแล้วครับ
examples.translation: I have already taken a shower (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom aap nam laew krap

examples.original: ฉันอาบน้ำเสร็จแล้วค่ะ
examples.translation: I have finished taking a shower (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan aap nam set laew ka

frontContent.text: ฉันกำลังจะอาบน้ำ

backContent.text: I am about to take a shower

cards.phonetic: chan gam-lang ja aap nam
cards.context: Stating that you will shower very soon (immediate future tense)

examples.original: ผมกำลังจะอาบน้ำพอดีครับ
examples.translation: I was just about to take a shower (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom gam-lang ja aap nam por-dee krap

examples.original: ฉันกำลังจะเข้าไปอาบน้ำค่ะ
examples.translation: I am about to go take a shower (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan gam-lang ja kao pai aap nam ka

frontContent.text: คุณกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่เหรอ

backContent.text: Are you taking a shower right now?

cards.phonetic: khun gam-lang aap nam yu rer
cards.context: Asking if someone is currently in the shower (present continuous tense)

examples.original: เธอกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่เหรอ
examples.translation: Are you taking a shower right now?
examples.phonetic: ter gam-lang aap nam yu rer

examples.original: ใครกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่ในห้องน้ำ
examples.translation: Who is taking a shower in the bathroom?
examples.phonetic: krai gam-lang aap nam yu nai hong nam

frontContent.text: ฉันกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่

backContent.text: I am taking a shower right now

cards.phonetic: chan gam-lang aap nam yu
cards.context: Stating that you are currently showering (present continuous tense)

examples.original: ขอโทษนะ ผมกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่
examples.translation: Sorry, I am taking a shower right now (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: kor-tote na, pom gam-lang aap nam yu

examples.original: เดี๋ยวนะ ฉันกำลังอาบน้ำอยู่
examples.translation: Just a moment, I am taking a shower right now (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: diao na, chan gam-lang aap nam yu

frontContent.text: ฉันจะอาบน้ำหลังอาหาร

backContent.text: I will take a shower after the meal

cards.phonetic: chan ja aap nam lang a-han
cards.context: Expressing plan to shower in the future (future tense)

examples.original: ผมจะอาบน้ำหลังจากกลับบ้าน
examples.translation: I will take a shower after I get home (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom ja aap nam lang jak glab baan

examples.original: ฉันจะอาบน้ำก่อนนอน
examples.translation: I will take a shower before sleeping (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan ja aap nam gorn non

frontContent.text: คุณจะอาบน้ำเมื่อไร

backContent.text: When will you take a shower?

cards.phonetic: khun ja aap nam meu-a-rai
cards.context: Asking about someone's future shower plan (future tense)

examples.original: คุณจะอาบน้ำตอนไหนครับ
examples.translation: When will you take a shower? (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: khun ja aap nam torn nai krap

examples.original: น้องจะอาบน้ำหลังเล่นเสร็จใช่ไหม
examples.translation: Will the child take a shower after finishing playing?
examples.phonetic: nong ja aap nam lang len set chai mai

frontContent.text: ฉันอาบน้ำทุกเช้า

backContent.text: I take a shower every morning

cards.phonetic: chan aap nam took chao
cards.context: Describing regular shower habits (present simple tense)

examples.original: ผมอาบน้ำวันละสองครั้ง
examples.translation: I take a shower twice a day (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom aap nam wan la song krang

examples.original: ฉันชอบอาบน้ำตอนเย็น
examples.translation: I like to shower in the evening (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan chob aap nam torn yen

frontContent.text: คุณอาบน้ำกี่ครั้งต่อวัน

backContent.text: How many times do you shower per day?

cards.phonetic: khun aap nam gee krang tor wan
cards.context: Asking about shower frequency (present simple tense)

examples.original: คุณอาบน้ำกี่ครั้งต่อวันครับ
examples.translation: How many times do you shower per day? (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: khun aap nam gee krang tor wan krap

examples.original: ปกติคุณอาบน้ำตอนไหนบ้าง
examples.translation: When do you usually take a shower?
examples.phonetic: pa-ga-ti khun aap nam torn nai bang

frontContent.text: ฉันอาบน้ำเมื่อเช้านี้

backContent.text: I took a shower this morning

cards.phonetic: chan aap nam meu-a chao nee
cards.context: Stating that you showered earlier (past simple tense)

examples.original: ผมอาบน้ำตอนตี 5 เมื่อเช้า
examples.translation: I took a shower at 5 AM this morning (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom aap nam torn tee ha meu-a chao

examples.original: ฉันอาบน้ำก่อนมาที่นี่
examples.translation: I took a shower before coming here (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan aap nam gorn ma tee nee

frontContent.text: คุณอาบน้ำเมื่อไร

backContent.text: When did you shower?

cards.phonetic: khun aap nam meu-a-rai
cards.context: Asking when someone showered in the past (past simple tense)

examples.original: คุณอาบน้ำครั้งสุดท้ายเมื่อไร
examples.translation: When was the last time you took a shower?
examples.phonetic: khun aap nam krang sut-tai meu-a-rai

examples.original: คุณอาบน้ำตอนไหนเมื่อวาน
examples.translation: When did you shower yesterday?
examples.phonetic: khun aap nam torn nai meu-a wan

frontContent.text: ฉันได้อาบน้ำมาแล้ว 2 ชั่วโมง

backContent.text: I took a shower 2 hours ago

cards.phonetic: chan dai aap nam ma laew song chua-mong
cards.context: Stating when you showered with time reference (past simple tense)

examples.original: ผมได้อาบน้ำมาแล้วตั้งแต่เช้า
examples.translation: I took a shower since this morning (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom dai aap nam ma laew tang tae chao

examples.original: ฉันอาบน้ำไปเมื่อสักครู่นี้
examples.translation: I took a shower just a moment ago (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan aap nam pai meu-a sak kroo nee

frontContent.text: ฉันกำลังอาบน้ำตอนที่โทรศัพท์ดัง

backContent.text: I was taking a shower when the phone rang

cards.phonetic: chan gam-lang aap nam torn tee to-ra-sap dang
cards.context: Describing an action that was interrupted in the past (past continuous tense)

examples.original: ผมกำลังอาบน้ำตอนที่ไฟดับ
examples.translation: I was taking a shower when the power went out (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom gam-lang aap nam torn tee fai dap

examples.original: ฉันกำลังอาบน้ำเมื่อคุณโทรมา
examples.translation: I was taking a shower when you called (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan gam-lang aap nam meu-a khun to ma

frontContent.text: คุณกำลังทำอะไรตอนที่ฝนตก

backContent.text: What were you doing when it rained?

cards.phonetic: khun gam-lang tam a-rai torn tee fon tok
cards.context: Asking what someone was doing during an event in the past (past continuous tense)

examples.original: คุณกำลังอาบน้ำตอนที่แผ่นดินไหวเหรอ
examples.translation: Were you taking a shower when the earthquake happened?
examples.phonetic: khun gam-lang aap nam torn tee paen-din wai rer

examples.original: เธอกำลังทำอะไรตอนที่ฉันโทรไป
examples.translation: What were you doing when I called?
examples.phonetic: ter gam-lang tam a-rai torn tee chan to pai

frontContent.text: ฉันอาบน้ำมา 3 วันแล้ว

backContent.text: I have been showering for 3 days

cards.phonetic: chan aap nam ma sam wan laew
cards.context: Describing how long you've been showering (present perfect continuous tense)

examples.original: ผมอาบน้ำเย็นมาเดือนหนึ่งแล้ว
examples.translation: I have been taking cold showers for a month now (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom aap nam yen ma deuan neung laew

examples.original: ฉันอาบน้ำที่นี่มาสองสัปดาห์แล้ว
examples.translation: I have been showering here for two weeks (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan aap nam tee nee ma song sap-da laew

frontContent.text: คุณอาบน้ำมานานแค่ไหนแล้ว

backContent.text: How long have you been showering?

cards.phonetic: khun aap nam ma naan kae nai laew
cards.context: Asking about the duration of a repeated action (present perfect continuous tense)

examples.original: คุณอาบน้ำในห้องนี้มากี่วันแล้ว
examples.translation: How many days have you been showering in this room?
examples.phonetic: khun aap nam nai hong nee ma gee wan laew

examples.original: คุณใช้สบู่นี้อาบน้ำมานานแค่ไหน
examples.translation: How long have you been using this soap to shower?
examples.phonetic: khun chai sa-boo nee aap nam ma naan kae nai

frontContent.text: ฉันจะได้อาบน้ำเมื่อไร

backContent.text: When will I get to shower?

cards.phonetic: chan ja dai aap nam meu-a-rai
cards.context: Asking about when you'll have the opportunity to shower (future tense)

examples.original: ผมจะได้อาบน้ำอุ่นเมื่อไร
examples.translation: When will I get to take a warm shower? (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom ja dai aap nam un meu-a-rai

examples.original: ฉันจะมีโอกาสได้อาบน้ำไหม
examples.translation: Will I have a chance to take a shower? (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan ja mee o-gat dai aap nam mai

frontContent.text: ถ้าฉันอาบน้ำเสร็จแล้ว ฉันจะโทรหาคุณ

backContent.text: If I finish showering, I will call you

cards.phonetic: ta chan aap nam set laew, chan ja to ha khun
cards.context: Expressing a condition and future result (conditional tense)

examples.original: ถ้าผมอาบน้ำเสร็จเร็ว ผมจะไปเจอคุณ
examples.translation: If I finish showering quickly, I will meet you (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: ta pom aap nam set reo, pom ja pai jer khun

examples.original: ถ้าน้ำร้อน ฉันจะอาบน้ำนานขึ้น
examples.translation: If the water is hot, I will shower longer (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: ta nam ron, chan ja aap nam naan keun

frontContent.text: ฉันควรจะอาบน้ำตอนนี้ไหม

backContent.text: Should I take a shower now?

cards.phonetic: chan kuan ja aap nam torn nee mai
cards.context: Asking for advice about showering (modal verb)

examples.original: ผมควรจะอาบน้ำก่อนออกไปไหม
examples.translation: Should I take a shower before going out? (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom kuan ja aap nam gorn ork pai mai

examples.original: ฉันจำเป็นต้องอาบน้ำก่อนนอนไหม
examples.translation: Do I need to take a shower before sleeping? (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan jam-pen tong aap nam gorn non mai

frontContent.text: ฉันอาบน้ำเสร็จก่อนที่เธอจะมาถึง

backContent.text: I had finished showering before you arrived

cards.phonetic: chan aap nam set gorn tee ter ja ma teung
cards.context: Describing a completed action before another past action (past perfect tense)

examples.original: ผมอาบน้ำเสร็จแล้วก่อนที่ฝนจะตก
examples.translation: I had finished showering before it rained (male speaker)
examples.phonetic: pom aap nam set laew gorn tee fon ja tok

examples.original: ฉันอาบน้ำเสร็จพอดีตอนที่โทรศัพท์ดัง
examples.translation: I had just finished showering when the phone rang (female speaker)
examples.phonetic: chan aap nam set por-dee torn tee to-ra-sap dang
